name: Genius Loci
summary: There is chaos everywhere: in her head and outside, in the big city. Things are taking on a life of their own. Young Reine is on the search, but she does not know what she is looking for. In delicate drawings and fluid animations, we see the world through her eyes and her perception becomes tangible.
info:
• 中文名: 地方守护神
  • 话数: 1
  • 别名: 她的异想世界
  • 上映年度: 2020-02-26
  • 片长: 16分钟
